original_text:
“‘For the blood she shed is in her midst:
    She poured it on the bare rock;
she did not pour it on the ground,
    where the dust would cover it.
korean_text: 그 피가 그 가운데에 있음이여 피를 땅에 쏟아 티끌이 덮이게 하지 않고 맨 바위 위에 두었도다

sentences.original_text: For the blood she shed is in her midst:
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 흘린 피가 그녀의 중심에 있으니

sentences.original_text: She poured it on the bare rock;
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그것을 벌거벗은 바위 위에 부었고

sentences.original_text: she did not pour it on the ground,
where the dust would cover it.
